Text: FW Oct Green Power Cc Original Message From Hamby John Sent Tuesday January PM To Hart Vivian Subject Oct Green Power

RE GreenPowerSeptxlsWhen do you need this by Were still trying to find SHs query Original Message From Ring Richard Sent Tuesday January AM To Hart Vivian Subject FW GreenPowerSeptxls Original Message From Smith Angela Sent Wednesday December AM To Ring Richard Subject GreenPowerSeptxls

meter data documentation Cc po NonPrivilegedpst I just talked to Pat Priestley from CSC to validate your diagram on MDMA for EEMC Shes confirmed that C is equivalent to MV and MUODS is equivalent to MDMA By September the transition from MUODS to MDMA should be completed Also in trying to get access to MV directly she said that the MV database is proprietary to the vendor ITRON CSC do not go into the database to pull the data out of MV They go through the front end and run reports Forwarded by Vivian HartHOUEES on AM Enron Energy Services From John Rutledge PM To Chris nronXgate Murray P nronXgate Michael ES Maurice ES Diann ES Todd ES Kenny ES Vivian ES Steven ES cc Subject meter data documentation In an effort to centralize information uncovered in various meetings I have put together a short document covering my understanding of the meter data flow Please take a look at spdocprojectanalysismeterdataanalysishtml and reply with any corrections additions and feedbackI will incorporate them into the document Pat Priest has told us that if we could get a WIP in by today regarding the daily download of meter data from MV CSC might be able to turn something around to us by next week Who is in charge of this process Who gives the goahead John

MUODS accessNonPrivilegedpst MUODS is the PGE book of business MDMA Forwarded by Vivian HartHOUEES on AM on PM To cc Subject Your request MBCR Part Here are the connection details for MUODS Please setup the TNS try logging in In case if you have any troubles please contact me I am working on getting you access to MV and will send you asap MUODS Connection Details MUODSWORLD DESCRIPTION ADDRESS PROTOCOL TCPHOST dubsnprdPORT CONNECTDATA SID mup Login Password mupreadmupread

RE CSC UPDATE Cc po NonPrivilegedpst Youre right in that the MV that holds the consumption data is in BTrieve not Oracle You will have to have a special driver to get to it Forwarded by Vivian HartHOUEES on PM From Chris nronXgate on PM To Diann ES cc Michael ES Vivian ES Murray P nronXgate Kenny ES Subject RE CSC UPDATE Diann Do you have an update on the status of the other two items we discussed CSCs ability to send all of our Calf Customers files out to the FTP server as they do with the Energy Sense customers along with the timeline to get this implemented The cost and timeline to put all of our customers into the Energy Sense website Chris Original Message From Huddleson Diann Sent Friday July PM To Stokley Chris Cc Frazier Michael Hart Vivian Subject Re CSC UPDATE Vivian has regained access to the MDMA However I need to control who has access so that we dont interfere with CSCs operation Let me know who will need access to this data Thanks From Chris nronXgate on PM To Diann ES cc Subject CSC UPDATE Diann I am flying back to Portland tomorrow morning at about arriving at Please call me at or email me w and update on you talks w CSC Thanks for your help Chris Stokley

Re CSC UPDATE Cc NonPrivilegedpst We have a common logon id that everyone uses The people that I know of who normally access the database are Michael Fraziers group John Rutledge from IT supporting Michael Frazier SH Maurice and John Hamby Forwarded by Vivian HartHOUEES on PM Diann Huddleson PM To Chris nronXgate ENRON cc Michael ES Vivian ES Subject Re CSC UPDATE Vivian has regained access to the MDMA However I need to control who has access so that we dont interfere with CSCs operation Let me know who will need access to this data Thanks From Chris nronXgate on PM To Diann ES cc Subject CSC UPDATE Diann I am flying back to Portland tomorrow morning at about arriving at Please call me at or email me w and update on you talks w CSC Thanks for your help Chris Stokley Embedded StdOleLink

MVNonPrivilegedpst I just talked to the developer and the MV and MDMA data sinks up daily The previous days read should be available in MDMA the next day I havent asked for a logon and password to get into MV because I am not sure you would want the data from MV From my understanding MV will hold the raw usage and it does not get validated for high low checks or other errors until it gets to MDMA If the previous days data is sufficient then MDMA should be good enough Let me know if you still need me to pursue further Forwarded by Vivian HartHOUEES on PM From Chris nronXgate on PM To Vivian ES cc Subject MV Vivian Have you heard anything back on the time in which they sink up MV and MDMA Also were you able to find out the password to get into MV just in case we have to go straight to the source Thanks again for all of your help on these issues Chris Stokley

MVNonPrivilegedpst Here is the data model and data flow diagram for MDMA I am trying to find out if the data from MV get interfaced into MDMA on a daily basis or not If it is done on a daily basis then I dont think there is a need to go into MV MV will have raw data and will not have gone through validations which are performed in MDMA Forwarded by Vivian HartHOUEES on PM From Chris nronXgate on PM To Vivian ES cc Subject MV Vivian I just wanted to leave you my contact numbers Cell Work Home I will be flying out tomorrow but I should be in around Pacific Time Please send me an email on where we stand with being able to get into the MV tables I have Jeff Richter chomping at the bit on this one so it would be a nice if we can get our hands on that data Thank you very much for your help on this topic
